channel.title: driver_load on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in driver_load on My New Hugo Site

item.title: WinDivert Driver Load
item.description: Detects the load of the Windiver driver, a powerful user-mode capture/sniffing/modification/blocking/re-injection package for Windows

item.title: Suspicious Driver Load from Temp
item.description: Detects a driver load from a temporary directory

item.title: Vulnerable Dell BIOS Update Driver Load
item.description: Detects the load of the vulnerable Dell BIOS update driver as reported in CVE-2021-21551
